title: Printing Block, late 18th century
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Wood block with metal pins for printing textiles. Design of curving fine branches with large blossoms and leaves in raised wood. Background of lozenge-shaped areas set off by wide lines of dots, each dot being a tiny metal pin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Printing Block, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: wood, metal. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1925-1-367.
